column3: “I'm smoking it right now and it's making me want to build a birdhouse”
“I'm on it right now" and I Love it......feels good man.

column2: uplifting and I'm not concerned with my pain.I can still feel the pain
column3: but it's not important. I've had a pretty crazy day and being all stressed out and in pain
column4: this Juicy Jack washed it away. I'm happy
column5: I love my life and there's no where else I'd ratherbe

column3:
“This is HANDS DOWN my favorite day time high. In my year long search thus far for my perfect daytime strain this has given me I would say 90% of what I have been looking for. I'm very FOCUSED, CREATIVE, and all around stoked after a good bowl which takes some time to smoke considering its density.

Its only missing that ENERGETIC kick that you get from Green Crack with the accompanying slow down in time. Your no slou...”

“Selected from a sweet tasting Jack Herer phenotype, this example is one of the most uplifting and stress relieving strains on the market today. A super satisfying aroma along with a taste that is really desirable make it a winner for any sativa fan out there. I purchased my Candy from Lifted Health and Wellness in San Francisco. Liked it so much I have make Candy Jack a regular on my shopping list. Ideal for daytime ...”

“If you try some of the topshelf at a decent dispensary or just know how to grow or a grower that makes top quality, candy jack is a super head and eventually body high that will put you to sleep when you are ready. It is one of the most euphoric jacks with a high cannabinoid content filled with trichomes and a lemony smell from the terpenes. Candy Jack is one of my favorite jack crosses I'd guess it would be somewher...”

“Fantastic Sativa. Wonderful for depression. Most Sativas tend to give me anxiety but this strain gave a sense of well being without the hazy effects on the mind many Sativa strains have. Definitely my go to sativa”
“The best of the best. This sativa really stands up to the post-modern
column5: wave of new sticky sticky chronic greens. My skull has an Irish waterfall in it. Is that what they want? It's a hat full of heads." -Dan Harmon

column1: The weed was very, um, did what it was supposed to do. It was fun. It was a fun weed, Doug. I'm always worried I'll get paranoid, cause you said this would have paranoia po...”

column3: “Migraine pain mild; nausea 6-7 when I medicated round 1000 or so. Takes bout 5-10 min to start working. Pain/nausea gone. Body high allowed me to eat breakfast! Head high was surprisingly sleepy; I passed out on dis one! How weird is that for a Sativa dominant?! I did note the head high being social & happy which was very nice. High still strong after I woke up from my 1 1/2 hour nap which is when I ate breakfast. Hi...”

“Migraine pain mild; nausea 6-7 when I medicated round 1000 or so. Takes bout 5-10 min to start working. Pain/nausea gone. Body high allowed me to eat breakfast! Head high was surprisingly sleepy; I passed out on dis one! How weird is that for a Sativa dominant?! I did note the head high being social & happy which was very nice. High still strong after I woke up from my 1 1/2 hour nap which is when I ate breakfast. Hi...”
“Really fun strain. Good for late night chillin on the couch watching a movie, but not too sedated to go do something. A must try if you haven't!”

“Comes on like a confident cat, strutting and purring into your lap. You will feel a few bumps going into it as your muscles unkink and your breathing grows deeper and more relaxed. About ten minutes in, after you achieve a pleasant body high, you'll get fleeting visions on your mind's eye, flickering cartoon ghosts which herald your transition to a higher state of consciousness. Cottonmouth is minimal, munchies begin...”

“I absolutely love this strain. I've been smoking some CO2 hash oil extract and it is so tasty I can just dab that all day. It's a great work weed" and excellent for wake and bakes. It works wonders on my GI tract
column4: always keeping everything moving which is a plus.”"

column3: “I would not recommend this specific sativa if you are predisposed to anxiety! I have an anxiety disorder, but yet I tend to do okay with most sativas - this one, however, gave me a *lot* of initial paranoia and a small panic attack. This period of anxiety only lasted about 20-30 minutes, but it was extremely uncomfortable, and I will refrain from this strain in the future.”

“The Candy Jack I picked up from Greenleaf Wellness in Berkeley was cured just right, moderately sticky buds, stems crisply (but not too crisply) snap when bent, really beautiful nose out of the bag, sweet, candy-like (like the Jolly Rancher cherry sticks I dug as a kid) but musky enough to exhibit a faint skunkiness, probably from the Jack Herer side of the strain.  

This is a strong, but not overpowering, smoke. ...”

“I actually really enjoyed this strain. I was concerned because of the high THC level that i might be a little too high too fast, but it all worked out. I was surprisingly not paranoid at all and I believe this is my new favorite stativa.”
“Good sativa, heavy crash. Had to take a nap 5 hours after smoking.”

“Okay y'all this strain is legit! For me it was a very upbeat, giggly high and perfect for social gatherings in my opinion.  I am a seasoned" smoker and after smoking a couple bong loads I laughed my a** off
column5: and even started to have a slight body tingle (is that a  thing?) Anyways
column6: I definitely recommend if you really need your spirits lifted. ♡”"

column3: “Smelled like a bag of jolly ranchers. Awesome strong sativa high. Made me want to get up and do something. Great for socializing.”

“First time really paying attention to exactly what strain I’m smoking, mostly bc this is the most awesome thing I’ve ever smoked. Super creative, tapped into the universe feeling, can be very social if that’s the intention/mission, also super fun just w my partner and I on the couch. No hangover the next day at all. Usually only do this at night bc it’s 3 hours and then I’m ready to sleep. Although hubby likes to mic...”

“Strain: Candy Jack
Product: Kurvana Vape Oil Concentrate
Environment: Saturday Night at Home

Review: First time trying Candy Jack. Nice flavor and aroma. Having a nice chill but alert head space. Minimal drowsy/sleepy feeling.”

“I found Candy Jack to be an energetic and uplifting sativa, great for day-time use; possessing a sweetness when smoked. 

I would recommend the strain to friends =D”

“This strain is great for a user who seeks an anti depressant or for the active stoner. Candy Jack is super uplifting from when you smell to when you spark it and inhale its citrusy smoke. Candy Jack is like an energy drink without the jitters and comes with a great smile and uplifted spirits!”

“I’m mighty surprised at the,” zippity do da”,brought on with just a couple of hits of this wonderfully flavorful herb. 

I’ve been alive for many moons, and have tried many Sativa varieties, but right now, Candy Jack is right there with, Durban Poison, and Ghost Train Haze, on my sativa favorite’s list.

Tasty, with the distinctive Jack Herrer scent and flavor, but supercharged with a sweeter flavor, and very asserti...”

“To the reviewer who wrote the first sentence of the introduction.
Specifically swift boost to your mood..."

column1: These 5 words combined have brought us dreams untold. Dreams are sold in laughter and giddy.
These 5 words provided us with several hours of entertainment!
Thank you from the bottom of our hearts

column3: “I ordered an 1/8 on accident. Best accident I ever made! Very flavorful, tingly smoke as found in high THC strains, smells great, and a nice productive stone. I will be making this a regular in my stock! I smoke it at night, although it's a sativa-dominant, because it doesn't get me all hyper. It helps u clear ur mind and relax.. Great for anxiety! Well done. I love this Candy Jack!”

“This strain is great for a user who seeks an anti depressant or for the active stoner. Candy Jack is super uplifting from when you smell to when you spark it and inhale its citrusy smoke. Candy Jack is like an energy drink without the jitters and comes with a great smile and uplifted spirits!”

“Strain: Candy Jack
Product: Kurvana Vape Oil Concentrate
Environment: Saturday Night at Home

Review: First time trying Candy Jack. Nice flavor and aroma. Having a nice chill but alert head space. Minimal drowsy/sleepy feeling.”
“A good top shelf strain. Made me a bit paranoid and anxious in public. Smells amazing. Roommate thought I had lit a candy scented candle.”
“Smelled like a bag of jolly ranchers. Awesome strong sativa high. Made me want to get up and do something. Great for socializing.”

“Oftentimes the effects of cannabis are akin to surfing. Out on the ocean with your board, you may find yourself in rhythm with the waves as they curl. Other times, you may find yourself in an anxious panic, fighting the unforgiving sea. What's important to remember in this situation, as with cannabis, is that it too shall pass, and one cannot fight the sea, but rather flow with it. Paddle out with Candy Jack and the ...”

“Had a LONG day. Lots of stress. I wanted to make a drink..., but all I’ve been getting from drinking is sick. Then, I remembered I had this stashed away. I took 3 nice drags and I could feel the difference within 2 minutes. My head was lighter. The fog went away. My outlook on the day changed from wanting to either break down and cry tonounching someone to “Fuck it”. It also stopped my Mindy from racing and thinking ...”
“Sensory overload for me but in a great way. This allowed me to be goofy. Talkative but limited due to the crazy head high.”
“One bowl made music sound so good that I legitimately jammed to Monster Rap club mix by Bobby Boris" Pickett & The Crypt Kickers. So I would say yeah
column4: it did a pretty good job. Oh and then I worked out - great energy strain.”"

column3: “Candy Jack is one of the best cheese strains I have toked thus far. This stuff hit me instantly with a rush of just relaxation and good feeling. It's fluffy white outer layer screams good quality and any experienced toker knows they're in for a treat. Similar to fruity sativas Candy Jack has a distinct taste, despite it's cheesy aroma, that is similar to various forms of liquorish. Almost instantly this strain sent m...”
“One of the most uplifting strains out there. Happiness in a pipe!”

“I love this strain it causes a heavy buzzy head high with light fuzzies that  pulse down your arms and legs it has a candied sour sage smell with woody undertones the taste was like a strange peppery ammonia taste it's relaxing I felt like I was in my own bubble walking down the street like I was a ghost and no one could see me”

“The smell of this strain is heavenly! Like a fresh fruit basket with a pungent after smell. The high is absolutely amazing too. I’m functional, motivated, and even ready to go to the gym! Every single time my dispensary has Candy Jack I purchase as much as I can! Try it for depression, PTSD, fatigue, etc. She is super uplifting, best enjoyed with friends, and pairs great with a Leinenkugel’s Summer Shandy. My recomme...”

“Wanna get stuff done and be productive? This is your strain. All I want to do on this strain is be productive. I went for a run  by the beach  on this strain and as I was running I wanted to stop and look at the waves because they looked so cool, but the weed started talking and told me to keep on running, then later when I was finishing my run sprinting up a hill and wanted to slow down the weed made me just put my ...”

“Oftentimes the effects of cannabis are akin to surfing. Out on the ocean with your board, you may find yourself in rhythm with the waves as they curl. Other times, you may find yourself in an anxious panic, fighting the unforgiving sea. What's important to remember in this situation, as with cannabis, is that it too shall pass, and one cannot fight the sea, but rather flow with it. Paddle out with Candy Jack and the ...”
“Nice smoke for daily mood enhancer.”
“Great social strain, got straight zooted”

“Wax Review:
Candy Jack is a pleasantly potent sativa with a deliciously sweet, fruity flavor. Just like its parent strain, Jack Herer, the effects are quick to feel, giving a boost in mood and energy. Great strain for during the day and at work.”
“Nice smoke for daily mood enhancer.”
“Sticky and dense”

“Nice smoke for daily mood enhancer.”

“Dude... this strain is amazing— felt so happy and at ease with my life even though my life has been really hard. This strain really took me to a place of euphoria bliss. I was tripping pretty hard because my hands looked really small for some reason— taking two fat hits gives hella visuals!”

“I love this strain it causes a heavy buzzy head high with light fuzzies that  pulse down your arms and legs it has a candied sour sage smell with woody undertones the taste was like a strange peppery ammonia taste it's relaxing I felt like I was in my own bubble walking down the street like I was a ghost and no one could see me”
“Sticky and dense”
“Great sativa.  If you like Jack Herer then you must try this”
“Best smell ever, like fruit candy.”

“After only a light double-tap on a bubbler, i was uplifted and markedly more jovial than before the bowl. (Prior to that, i'd been trying to talk myself into a better mood...shaking off the day's challenges...) I feel like i want to feel now, and that's SUPER! Seems to have a short duration and i'm still on the comedown. Candy Jack allows me to immerse myself in a focal point -say Music Composition- and still have en...”
“Great sativa.  If you like Jack Herer then you must try this”
“The club that I purchased the Candy Jack advertised that the Jack Candy was 2nd place at the High Time Medicinal Cannabis Cup in San Francisco (June 2010)."”"
“love the strain for middle of the day smoking great high smooth smokin”

“#1 FAVORITE STRAIN IN ALL ASPECTS (SMELL FEELING TASTE ETC) 
5 STARS”
“2 hits and i was gone. this shit is really good, and its effects are nice like all dros”
“All I can say, is I don't feel my hip pain anymore and my mind is buzzing with happiness. 11/10 for CandyJack”
“absolutely love it. my new favorite. if you find it grab it immediately. great feeling and flavor. a gamers delight.”

“This strain put me in a really good mood. Sometimes with sativas dominants I get a bit paranoid, and for this strain this was the case. However, I usually am able to turn that into excitement and the feeling was very subtle and quick for me. I love this for when im hanging out with frienda having a good time.”
“Head high , body tingling, all I did was think .Didn’t relax me and made me a bit too anxious.”
“Kept me super active, with a major case of the munchies. A slight body tingle with a lot of positive energy, I bet I could clean the hell out of my house after smoking a bowl of this.”

“This strain is perfect for smoking on a hikes or running your errands on the weekend!
It had a beautiful citrusy smooth taste with a mild body high. One of my favorites!”
“Taste great awesome sativa totally blows your mind purchased at the greendoor”
“Excellent bud for wanting to do an activity with no burn out.”
“CandyJack stole my heart away from Blue Dream. It helps so much with my health and wellbeing. It's my new go-to daytime smoke.”
“Wasn't to fond of it before, but I decided to purchase it again, and again. Made its way to my top 15. Smells like a box of lemons heads candy :-)”
“bhomb shatter. amazing terp profile”
“Strong.”
“Got me speaking from my creative mind, great strain for social gatherings and parties”
“Easily one of my top favorite sativa's. It makes you feel very up and alive while being super relaxed. The main thing is how happy and euphoric it makes you. You just felt on top of the world.”

“Did a few dabs of candy jack. Hit me pretty hard, mostly feel disconnected from my body and in tune completely with my mind. Sat down focused on drawing for quite a bit, simultaneously listened to Fleetwood Mac. Would recommend.”

“Either the person who sold it to me got it wrong or this thing affects me differently than the majority but I smoke it for 3 times now and it shuts me down completely. I fall asleep on the couch and wake up few hours later with a bad hangover.”
“Very intense head buzz. One of the hard-core type out there”
“good high during the day.”
“Very intense head buzz. One of the hard-core type out there”
“Over doing it causes the paranoia to kick in, other than that superb sativa!”

“had Select Strains Caj cartridge. 93% 
best I've ever had. major fan!”
“gets u jacked up”
“Very nice, fluffy, happy, goofy.”
“it's taste is good as well as it's effect.”
“This makes me so happy.”

“had Select Strains Caj cartridge. 93% 
best I've ever had. major fan!”
“gets u jacked up”
“Very nice, fluffy, happy, goofy.”
“I fee like I can write a book after smoking this.. And I'm no author. Sweet & sticky. Would recommend! Smells like a candy factory.”
“it's taste is good as well as it's effect.”

“This strain seemed to have an unpleasant metallic taste and had a lower potency than I was used to. That being said, I've had the best sex of my life after my boyfriend and I smoke it. Very uplifting, happy, horny high, no munchies, no lethargy. Highly recommend”
“This makes me so happy.”
“Energizing, slightly hallucinogenic. I wouldn’t use at bedtime, but I would use with a group of old friends to stir up some laughter.”
“good high during the day.”
“great strain makes me get lost in my own mind when im chilling but its a great strain for middle of the day”
“Had some Candy Jack from Denver. Well cured, looks excellent. Cannot say enough about the taste and smell. Smoked very well.”
“I fee like I can write a book after smoking this.. And I'm no author. Sweet & sticky. Would recommend! Smells like a candy factory.”
“Well round sweet and sour. Kind of tangie. Very heady. Delicous!!!”

“This strain seemed to have an unpleasant metallic taste and had a lower potency than I was used to. That being said, I've had the best sex of my life after my boyfriend and I smoke it. Very uplifting, happy, horny high, no munchies, no lethargy. Highly recommend”

“I'm looking for something that will help me with my migraine, I saw here some reviews from people who loved it and it helped them with pain. So I gave it a try. 
It helps with pain, but only for hour or two, after that the pain comes back. If I smoke at a moment when I don't have migraine attack , it comes right after. 
For me, Candy Jack doesn't work good for pain.. but! Maybe for someone who doesn't have migraine o...”
“Good high. Definitely a sativa yet I feel a slight body buzz I guess you could say. I normally lean toward indica dominant hybrids, but I will for sure use again!”
“Smell amazing, looks amazing, sticky bud, ok high... Above average munchies.”

“I had a great batch of Candy Jack a few months ago.  The smell was some of the smelliest of the Jack lineage that I have tried.  Great taste and appearance.  Ideal for morning and day time use.  Helped keep me focused and gave me little bit of energy, mostly euphoric feeling.  Will def pick some up again next time I encounter it.”

“First Sativa I've ever tried. I wasn't a huge fan. I went for a walk while using a vap. Within 20 minutes, that paranoid feeling started to creep up on me. I'm always cautions as a train station for jumpers and pullers on a normal day unfortunately between the dizzies and a fear of jumpers, I wound up feeling nervous and sick. Maybe this is a stay home and curl up on the couch with a movie strain?

On the bright side...”
“this smells so sweet and tastes the same. very crystaly and hairy. love this strain.”

“I went on a night hike with a friend and tried vaping some Candy Jack with a portable dry leaf vaporizer.  I am not used to vaporizing cannabis, and I prefer the effects of smoking, but it was still quite pleasant.  It came on slow and crept up.  I had a good amount of energy and sense of adventure.  I did become slightly paranoid in quick spurts during this experience and I would expect it to be common with any nigh...”
“This is the best morning smoke! Love Candy Jack!!”

“This strain is a great morning medication. I noticed it helped me with pain yet didn't leave me feeling like a zombie (although zombie is good too) and I was able to move pretty well. The taste is wonderful. Very potent and I think I really love this Candy Jack. I think You will love it too!”
“gud for chillin! makes u feel happy and laught”
“Amazing for depression and lovely flavor.”
“Definitely one of my favorite sativa strains! A top shelf angel 😍”

“I'm not noticing the flavor or scent a lot of people are, but it's a fairly smooth smoke and I appreciate that: I don't like harshness. Great anti-depressant! Good for creativity and focus. More a mind than body high. I used to be prone to anxiety from some strains, so I took it slowly on this one based on the reviews, and I'm happy to report no anxiety at all. You can cruise along all day on this stuff and get a lot...”

“Candy Jack - thank you! With the power off for 40 hours (it's now back on) and waking up on Thursday morning to a 7°C, 45°F inside temperature at home, I was never so happy to see Friday evening finally arrive.
I knew a puff would help right this boat, so after carefully selecting, I rolled up a nice joint of Candy Jack. Sweet like candy, strong like bull. I felt instantly relieved of tightness and tension. My whole ...”
“Had me active but felt calm. It was smooth when smoking too. Didn't feel paranoid or dizzy either. I'd recommended it though. Good experience.”

“Favorite tasting strain so far!  Great for daytime - I wasn't sleepy at all.  Gave me a bit of energy, enough to where I'm not jittery.  Tasted like honey + pine + flowers.  Pretty sweet when you exhale, I used my vape.  Even in a joint, you can taste the sweet.  Candy Jack made me feel confident, like it broke that barrier of embarrassment, I was talkative also.  I never talk, so for me to talk for 3 minutes straigh...”

“Rolled up a fat one after a tough day and man did it completely flip me over. Very cerebral, euphoric and tasted great. Felt like the high rushed over me like water and gave me a fresh outlook. I think it was the perfect strain for the situation. Clean energized high that lasted a while. Was amazing and will definitely revisit this one.”
“My fave.Christian”
“This is a popular strain in San Francisco, and my Go To" weed
column4: "when it doubt". I try to always keep some Candy Jack on hand.

column1: Definitely more on the head side.”"

column3: “I don't like this strain......I LOVE IT !!!  hahaha I get s#:? done .... keeps me in the zone in the workouts I do ... clean the whip...  wash dishes.. you get the picture. I got this as a shatter .. I think it intensified the strain feeling I give it an 8 out of 10.”
“I am glad I picked this up because it picks me up! :) The Candy Jack I have right now is very potent and uplifting.”
“Definitely feeling the euphoria and happiness.”
“Super slowed response time.. felt like I was trippin”
“Fun sativa that produces the giggles. Too much made me a lil anxious, but it's definitely a crazy good top shelf bud. Made me focused and uplifted.”
“The batch I have smells and tastes very similar to Jack Herer's earthy/pine aroma.  However, prominent sweet flavors are left on your tongue upon exhale....especially when vaporized.”
“A good top shelf strain. Made me a bit paranoid and anxious in public. Smells amazing. Roommate thought I had lit a candy scented candle.”
“Very solid sativa. Enjoyable without being too much.”
“Favorite here only for special occasions or any occasion! Great for blunt and vaping, wouldnt roll this in a joint because its too sticky.”
“Way too head heavy for my taste. Really didn't like this strain and that's a rare thing!”
“Tastes AMAZING!!!”
“Está a toda madre .....”
“bring it back super berry flavor top ten weed”
“Tasted amazing!”
“Nice but a little too.busy for me😙I'd prefer Blue Buddha 💙”
“Its a good high but that high come when you get there, catch my drift? It tooks a good amount of this bud to get you stoney boloney to not feel the pain. But flavor is off the chain”

“Talk about a strain. This is now something I will constantly search for when shopping for strains. It's such a head high, makes you think very deeply lol. Don't underestimate it's power either, it usually takes 2 or 3 bowls to get me stoned but man one bowl of candy jack and I'm floating. Very good highly recommend for someone who wants to really just relax and not worry about things.”
“Great ass sativa! Super uplifting, best day time type of bud. Gives a sweet amount of energy, and munchies werent too present with it. Would totally purchase again”
“candy jack is great for anytime of the day. tastes like cotton candy and it gets you baked as fuck.”

“This is officially my favorite sativa strain. Im a hybrid/indica dominant type and this sativa blew my socks off. The taste was a mild citrus with almost immediate enhanced sense of touch. All the nerves in my skin felt the subtlest variations of temp and pressure. It definitely increases focus and ability to think. Mid way thru i felt the need to be active so i designed 3 new personal effect hoodies lol.”
“Very amazing the taste is nice an citrusy I'm not a sativa fan at all but this strains is amazing in every way I got mine in crumble would love to try the flower out”
“great for getting your energy up. good for fighting fatigue”
“The smell alone sold me. Sticky buds, smooth smoke.”
“A good top shelf strain. Made me a bit paranoid and anxious in public. Smells amazing. Roommate thought I had lit a candy scented candle.”
“It was sweet and very uplifting. I organized my best friends nail polishes and tried to make an organizer out of an old cereal box lol.”

“I loveeee Candy Jack!
If you are ever having a dull day or feel bored, a couple hits of this will cause immediate relief and maybe inspire a few laughs.
Sativas have never really made me paranoid, so I've never had a problem with how head-high candy jack makes me. 
Daytime strain solely, will keep you entertained with creative thoughts for hours. One of my favorites for sure!”

“usually don't write reviews, but got my hands on some candy jack the other night. one of my most memorable highs. smoked a few bong packs and i was all smiles. extremely happy high. lots of laughing, got me higher than usual. 10/10 would recommend”

“I’ve been smoking this via pen before working out, and I have been had the greatest experience in the gym ever. Lifting more weight then usual, at more reps, without the soreness after. Keeps me focused and energized. One of my favorite strains.”

“First of all, this strain is no doubt an offspring of Jack Herer. It only took me about 5 puffs from a pipe to feel its dizzying effects and sudden happiness kick in. At the same time, there's a small body tingle eminating from my spine out to my extremities. Perfect for those seeking daytime pain/depression relief. Only downside is I got too dizzy and went hazy for about 30 minutes. No worries though, awoke feeling ...”
“Love it.  Had some before work.  Mind has been focused and creative all day.  Made me very productive.   Definitely getting more!”
“The first thing that caught my attention was the extremely sweet smell, couldn't stay away from it ever since. Very uplifting high, smooth and tasty hits.”

“My main use for medicinal marijuana is chronic anxiety.  I've been experimenting with rare sativa-dominant strains with high ratio of CBD:THC to stay relaxed through the day, but while even those relieve my worries, they leave me feeling somewhat numb to life during the high.  CANDY JACK COMPLETELY SHIFTS MY MOOD AND ENERGY LEVELS from ya know
column4: I think I'll stay inside today and watch tv by myself" to "WHO'S COMMING...”"

column3: “This strain gave me the ability to eat and eat. Definite Sativa..with the head high leaving your body and mind both uplifted. At least until you eat, then, it had me fall asleep about 45 minutes later. Helped with pain a bit and depression and the happy, giggly uplifted feeling is definitely felt. I definitely can see how this strain would increase anxiety in people with disorders/disabilities in this area. Overall, ...”
“Amazing”
“CandyJack stole my heart away from Blue Dream. It helps so much with my health and wellbeing. It's my new go-to daytime smoke.”
“Overall a great strain, I tend to save it for the evening, as it has a heavy crash and gives me some interesting dreams.”

“This strain is amazing. I smoked a couple joints of this last night as mixed with some green crack, by far one of the best highs I have ever had. It was like a million little tingles all through mead and my body, relieved me of any social anxiety, helped me with my music, and it lasted a long time too. Will be picking this up again!”
“Well I'm on this right now and what can I say it's a beautiful strain its sent being a really strong pine is wonderful thing and over all it's a great body high in just relaxed <3 well that's all”
“I think this strain has a nootropic effect. Boosts your mood and helps you think/tackle projects. I could program Python on this stuff lol! Really great lightweight cannabis.”
“a dose of reality with this one feels like a true jack I highly recommend it”
“One of my personal favorite strains. The smell is such a potent and sour jack smell and smokes extremely smooth! Leaves the room with a immense aroma after one bowl! Definitely recommend trying!”

“Absolutely in love. My dude told me I had two choice, kick back and chill or kick back and game, and I'm more of the gaming type. Candy Jack has me alert and able to focus, while also relaxed. Cotton mouth is rough, but so worth it.”

“This is one of my favorite day time strains, I'm immediately relieved of my pain and my mind goes to a happier creative place.  The flavor is really nice, which is important to me..  Great for relief of fatigue as well, better than a cup of coffee!”

“This is a great daytime strain if you smoke just a couple hits, but it's deceivingly potent. The indica-dominant hybrid sunk #1 comes out in Candy Jack's relaxing, stress relieving effects, while still giving you that focused, feel-good high that Jack Herer is known for. By far this is one my favorites due to its sheer versatility.”

“САИDY JАСK 
it a sativa dominant marihuana.
you take out the bud.
grind it.
saca la canala.
roll it.
smoke it.
and the feeling of floating it’s amazing.
never ending mindless world.
full of light.
a tool to let your problems flow away, to see they are only human situations that can be solve as easy as they came.”
“It tastes great”
“I’m so happy right now, only smoked 1 gram half an hour ago— seeing weird shit, eyes super dark red, conspiracy theories are tripping me out so hard right now.”
“very potent very smooth has a lot of flavor”
“Energizing, slightly hallucinogenic. I wouldn’t use at bedtime, but I would use with a group of old friends to stir up some laughter.”

“This is a sativa for sure! It's a very concentrated head high, but it sure does help me stay focused and productive. Great wake and bake bud, in fact, it goes great with coffee! Not to mention I have a greater sense of well being, and it makes me really happy. I don't recommend it if you have anxiety or panic attacks because it is a concentrated head high. It sure does taste like cotton candy though!”
“Awesome strain wish their was bigger buds I got, but had a awesome clear head high and spiritually uplifting 💨💨💨💨💨 could puff this clean smoke all day tell dinner!”
“was expecting it to last longer...nice not that intense”
“Head high , body tingling, all I did was think .Didn’t relax me and made me a bit too anxious.”
“Very chill time with the homies.  A creative and functional high for sure.  Had a great time.”
“Very intense head buzz. One of the hard-core type out there”

“Either the person who sold it to me got it wrong or this thing affects me differently than the majority but I smoke it for 3 times now and it shuts me down completely. I fall asleep on the couch and wake up few hours later with a bad hangover.”

“Did a few dabs of candy jack. Hit me pretty hard, mostly feel disconnected from my body and in tune completely with my mind. Sat down focused on drawing for quite a bit, simultaneously listened to Fleetwood Mac. Would recommend.”
“Easily one of my top favorite sativa's. It makes you feel very up and alive while being super relaxed. The main thing is how happy and euphoric it makes you. You just felt on top of the world.”
“Got me speaking from my creative mind, great strain for social gatherings and parties”
“Strong.”
“bhomb shatter. amazing terp profile”
“a solid strain perfect for keeping me on point during my 3rd shift hours”

“A lovely strain. As soon as I opened the container I was hit with the sweet and citrusy aroma of the Candy Jack and I really did feel like a kid in a candy store! I can't wait to try it with my vaporizer because even smoking this strand is smooth. The effects- a very euphoric, energy filled high. It's a very up-in-the-clouds kind of high but I can still stay focused and awake. Definitely recommend!”

“Second time with Candy Jack. I decided to cut it with some tea since my last experience was too intense for my liking. I did a 50/50 blend of Candy Jack with some Chamomile tea. The flavor was light, and the buzz is mild leaving me functional. I was able to get up and start moving again as I was feeling really tired and run down.”
“not a fan. have to mix it with other potent buds to get a good high. not even going to fill out the rest of this review”

“not going to get this again. good flavor, but not my kind of high. gives me headaches and belly aches and makes me miss my beloved indica. not bad if you haven't smoked in a while.... my tolerance is too high for this strain to work properly.”
“terrible paranoia, terrible dry mouth, and i honestly feel like I'm in the 1990s when I'm on it, and I know that sounds great but it's not”
“The only thing I like about this was the taste and smell this by far was the weakest sativa strain I’ve had before. The high is very lite”
“For me being a huge jack herer fan , I decided to try candy jack. It is a  good potent strain. It taste smooth and fruity. It haves a very sweet aroma. I really like it so far.”

“ive been smokin as normal the last few days with candy jack. and as all good nothing to brag about but still real good. then yesterday i got up with a wake and bake,,,,, and i got freakin ripped! i was nervous and uncomfortable. im not sure if it was the smoke or some stress ive been feeling. its been along time since ive had such a dark anxiety .

BUY AGAIN:  ill think about it”
“A good sativa.”

“I was so focused on reading a book, but I was so hungry I ate the book. then I needed to get my bag of skittles  on the roof but when I got up there I was so stoned I fell off the roof and landed in the pool. it was empty.”
